title: Behavioural Health Industry is reaching an estimated value of US$ 156.3 Billion, with a CAGR of 3.4% between 2022 and 2028 - FMIBlog
text: The [Global Behavioral Health Industry](https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/behavioral-health-market) has exhibited substantial growth over the past decade, and it is set to continue on this trajectory, according to the latest market insights. In 2017, the market generated a remarkable revenue of US$ 128.2 billion, and it is anticipated to expand at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 3.4% between 2022 and 2028, reaching an estimated value of US$ 156.3 billion. One of the most significant drivers of this growth is the increasing awareness and demand for behavioral health services, with North America expected to claim the largest revenue share in the global market throughout the forecast period. Currently, nearly 43.8 million adult Americans grapple with mental health issues, emphasizing the pressing need for accessible and effective behavioral health therapies. Get a Sample Copy of the Report [https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/sample/rep-gb-5375](https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/sample/rep-gb-5375) Global Behavioural Health Market: Segmental Analysis & Forecast Based on service type, disorder type, and geography, the global market for behavioural health is divided into these categories. The market is divided into outpatient counselling, intensive case management, home-based treatment services, inpatient hospital treatment, emergency mental health care, and other service types based on the type of service provided. The type segment for inpatient hospital treatment services is predicted to have the biggest revenue share in the global market for behavioural health. In the upcoming years, home-based treatment services are anticipated to grow in popularity with consumers, with a CAGR of 4.0% predicted for this market during the projected period. The market is divided into sections based on the types of disorders: drug abuse disorder, eating disorder, post-traumatic stress disorder (PSTD), bipolar disorder, and depression, among others. Due to a large patient pool internationally and a high acceptance of behavioural health therapy among patients with anxiety issues, the anxiety disorder sector is predicted to continue to lead the global behavioural health market among all condition categories. The WHO estimates that 260 million individuals worldwide have an anxiety disorder. Additionally, outpatient counselling for kids with ADHD, rehabilitation programmes for those with substance abuse disorders, awareness-raising efforts for mental illnesses and drug addiction, etc. are some of the main drivers propelling the expansion of the global market for behavioural health. The global market for behavioural health is anticipated to have positive revenue growth as a result of government measures to ease the burden of mental illness and the provision of rehabilitation services by non-governmental organisations (NGO). Global Behavioural Health Market: Competition Analysis The global market for behavioural health is fragmented with many local and regional level players operating in the worldwide market. Some of the key players featured in the global behavioural health market report include Acadia Healthcare Co., Inc., Universal Health Services Inc., Magellan Health Inc., National Mentor Holdings Inc., Behavioral Health Services Inc., Behavioral Health Network Inc., North Range Behavioral Health, Strategic Behavioral Health LLC, Seton Healthcare Family (Ascension Health) and Ocean Mental Health Services Inc. etc. among others.
